entry.title: ğŸ”´ CRITICAL: E1001 - SYSTEM_INIT_FAILED
entry.summary: System initialization failed - Core system components failed to initialize properly during application startup.
entry.content:
System Initialization Failed

Department: Technology Department ğŸ’»

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 500

Description: Core system components failed to initialize properly during application startup.

ğŸ” Common Causes:

  • Insufficient system resources (memory, disk space)
  • Missing or corrupted configuration files
  • Failed dependency injection
  • Database connection failure during startup
  • Missing environment variables

ğŸ’¡ Quick Fix Commands:


# Check system resources
free -m && df -h

# Validate environment
bun run env:validate

# Check system logs  
journalctl -u fire22-dashboard

# Test database connectivity
bun run health:database

ğŸ“ Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag

ğŸ“š Documentation: System Troubleshooting Guide

entry.title: ğŸ”´ CRITICAL: E2001 - DB_CONNECTION_FAILED
entry.summary: Database connection failed - Unable to establish connection to database server, preventing all data operations.
entry.content:
Database Connection Failed

Department: Technology Department ğŸ’»

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 503

Description: Unable to establish connection to database server, preventing all data operations.

ğŸ” Immediate Actions:


# Check database health
bun run health:database

# Test connectivity
ping db-host.fire22.ag

# Verify connection string
bun run test:db-connection

# Check database logs
docker logs fire22-postgres

ğŸš¨ Impact: All database operations are blocked

ğŸ“ Emergency Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | ops-manager@fire22.ag

entry.title: ğŸ”´ CRITICAL: E7001 - FIRE22_API_CONNECTION_FAILED
entry.summary: Fire22 API connection failed - Unable to connect to Fire22 sportsbook API, preventing betting operations.
entry.content:
Fire22 API Connection Failed

Department: Operations Department âš™ï¸ | Technology Department ğŸ’»

Severity: CRITICAL

HTTP Status: 503

Description: Unable to connect to Fire22 sportsbook API, preventing betting operations and data sync.

ğŸ” Emergency Diagnostics:


# Check Fire22 API status
curl https://api.fire22.ag/health

# Test DNS resolution
nslookup api.fire22.ag

# Verify API credentials
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $FIRE22_TOKEN" https://api.fire22.ag/auth/verify

# Check rate limits
curl -I https://api.fire22.ag/v1/limits

ğŸš¨ Business Impact: Sportsbook operations disrupted, customer betting blocked

ğŸ“ Emergency Escalation: ops-manager@fire22.ag (Primary) | tech-team@fire22.ag (Technical)

ğŸ“ˆ Monitor: Fire22 Integration Dashboard

entry.title: âš ï¸ WARNING: E3001 - API_UNAUTHORIZED
entry.summary: Unauthorized API request - Request lacks valid authentication credentials or token has expired.
entry.content:
Unauthorized API Request

Department: Technology Department ğŸ’» | Customer Support ğŸ§

Severity: WARNING

HTTP Status: 401

Description: Request lacks valid authentication credentials or token has expired.

ğŸ” Quick Diagnostics:


# Verify token format
echo $API_TOKEN | base64 -d | jq '.'

# Test authentication
curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_TOKEN" https://api.fire22.ag/auth/verify

# Check token expiration
jwt decode $API_TOKEN

# Refresh token if expired
curl -X POST https://api.fire22.ag/auth/refresh

ğŸ‘¥ User Impact: API clients experiencing authentication failures

ğŸ“ Contact: tech-team@fire22.ag | support@fire22.ag

entry.title: ğŸŸ¡ ERROR: E8001 - TELEGRAM_BOT_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED
entry.summary: Telegram bot authentication failed - Bot token is invalid or expired, preventing customer communication.
entry.content:
Telegram Bot Authentication Failed

Department: Customer Support Department ğŸ§ | Technology Department ğŸ’»

Severity: ERROR

HTTP Status: 401

Description: Telegram bot token is invalid or expired, preventing bot functionality and customer communication.

ğŸ” Bot Diagnostics:


# Verify bot token
curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/getMe

# Check bot permissions
curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/getMyCommands

# Test webhook
curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN/getWebhookInfo

# Monitor bot logs
bun run logs:telegram-bot

ğŸ‘¥ Customer Impact: Bot notifications disabled, customer support affected

ğŸ“ Primary Contact: support@fire22.ag

ğŸ”§ Technical Support: tech-team@fire22.ag

ğŸ¤– Bot Management: Contact @BotFather for token issues
